speaker: Liam Kavanagh
title: Making Enterprise GPT Real with Azure Cognitive Search and Azure OpenAI Service
description:
Exciting news for enterprises! Bring the power of OpenAI's ChatGPT model to your own app experiences with Azure Cognitive Search and Azure OpenAI service!  With precise control over the knowledge base, you can now deliver in-context, relevant responses for your organization's data, while respecting information protection controls.  In this episode of the AI Show, Liam Cavanagh joinw Seth Juarez to demo how Azure Cognitive Search combined with Azure OpenAI Service allows enterprises to index and retrieve data, finding the most relevant pieces of information, and presenting them to the language model for top-ranked results. 

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:17 Welcome and Intros
01:25 Overview - Chat with your data
03:10 Demo
11:20 Learn more
12:28 Wrap
